unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! India's Film Fest Scene is Buzzing!
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! India's Film Fest Scene is Buzzing!

unnormalised: Guess what, movie buffs? The film festival circuit is heating up faster than a plate of biryani at a Hyderabad wedding! From the snow-capped Himalayas to the sunny beaches of Goa, celluloid dreams are coming alive.
normalised: Guess what, movie buffs? The film festival circuit is heating up faster than a plate of biryani at a Hyderabad wedding! From the snow-capped Himalayas to the sunny beaches of Goa, celluloid dreams are coming alive.

unnormalised: Word on the street is the Mumbai International Film Festival (MIFF) is gearing up for another awesome edition, promising a star-studded lineup and a whole lotta indie goodness. Plus, keep your eyes peeled for whispers about the Kolkata International Film Festival – always a big draw.
normalised: Word on the street is the Mumbai International Film Festival (M I F F) is gearing up for another awesome edition, promising a star-studded lineup and a whole lotta indie goodness. Plus, keep your eyes peeled for whispers about the Kolkata International Film Festival – always a big draw.

unnormalised: Forget Hollywood, these festivals are showcasing the best of Indian cinema, from hard-hitting documentaries to feel-good rom-coms.
normalised: Forget Hollywood, these festivals are showcasing the best of Indian cinema, from hard-hitting documentaries to feel-good rom-coms.

unnormalised: And it's not just about the movies! Expect after-parties that last till dawn, chai-fueled discussions about the future of Indian cinema, and maybe even a chance encounter with your favorite Bollywood star. Think you can handle that?
normalised: And it's not just about the movies! Expect after-parties that last till dawn, chai-fueled discussions about the future of Indian cinema, and maybe even a chance encounter with your favorite Bollywood star. Think you can handle that?

unnormalised: They say this year's editions will feature films from over 50 countries, racking up thousands of kilometers of travel for filmmakers.
normalised: They say this year's editions will feature films from over fifty countries, racking up thousands of kilometers of travel for filmmakers.

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn, book your tickets and prepare to be mesmerized! It's showtime, folks!
normalised: So, grab your popcorn, book your tickets and prepare to be mesmerized! It's showtime, folks!

unnormalised: Don't forget to check out the smaller regional festivals too. They are hidden gems.
normalised: Don't forget to check out the smaller regional festivals too. They are hidden gems.
